name: update: A&AI ( VNF)
xml:
<update plugin="org.openecomp.sdnc.sli.aai.AAIService" resource="generic-vnf" key="generic-vnf.vnf-id = $tmp.aai-data-vnf.vnf-id" force="true" local-only="false" pfx="tmp.AnAI-data.vnf" >
<parameter name="prov-status" value="`$tmp.aai-prov-status`"/>

name: set: Append to error message
xml:
<set>
	  <parameter name="error-message" value="`'Get from A&AI Failed for ' + $service-configuration-notification-input.service-information.service-instance-id + '.' + $error-message`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="Get Request to AnAI Failed"/>
<parameter name="field3" value="`$service-configuration-notification-input.service-information.service-instance-id`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="CALLING Get fOR SERVICEINSTANCEID"/>
<parameter name="field3" value="`$service-configuration-notification-input.service-information.service-instance-id`"/>
<parameter name="RESPONSEMSG" value="`$response-message`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="VNFID" value="`$tmp.aai-data-vnf.vnf-id`"/>
<parameter name="RELATIONSHIPLEN" value="`$tmp.aai-data-vnf.relationship-list.relationship_length`"/>
<parameter name="RELATIONSHIPVALUE" value="`$tmp.aai-data-vnf.relationship-list.relationship[0].relationship-data[0].relationship-value`"/>

name: set: Append to error message
xml:
<set>
	  <parameter name="error-message" value="`'Update to A&AI Failed for ' + $tmp.aai-data-vnf.vnf-id + '.' + $error-message`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="Update Request to AnAI Failed"/>
<parameter name="field3" value="`$tmp.aai-data-vnf.vnf-id`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="field2" value="Get Request to AnAI Failed"/>
<parameter name="field3" value="`$service-configuration-notification-input.service-information.service-instance-id`"/>
<parameter name="ErrorMessage" value="`$tmp.aai-data-vnf.error-message`"/>
<parameter name="HTTP Code" value="`$tmp.aai-data-vnf.error.http.response-code`"/>

name: set: Append to error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name="error-message" value="`'Get from A&AI Failed for ' + $service-configuration-notification-input.service-information.service-instance-id + '.' + $tmp.aai-data-vnf.error-message + '.HTTP Code:' + $tmp.aai-data-vnf.error.http.response-code + '.' + $error-message `"/>
